James.Gifts.Loved: Intriguing... This could prove useful. My gratitude.
James.Gifts.Liked: Hmm, not quite what I expected, but it has its merits. Thank you.
James.Gifts.Disliked: This is... unexpected. I'm not sure what to make of it.
James.Gifts.Hated: This is an insult! Do you take me for a fool? Begone.
James.Gifts.Neutral: A curious offering. I shall consider its purpose.
